headline: Dividend Stocks To Consider In August 2025
summary: As the U.S. stock market hovers near record highs with major indexes experiencing two straight weeks of gains, investors are closely watching Federal Reserve actions and retail earnings for further direction. In this environment, dividend stocks can offer a stable income stream and potential for long-term growth, making them an attractive option for those looking to balance their portfolios amidst fluctuating interest rate expectations.

headline: Virtus Investment Rewards Shareholders With a 6.7% Dividend Hike
summary: VRTS raises its quarterly dividend by 6.7% to $2.40 per share, marking the eighth straight year of annual increases.
